thread.section_title: Carflexi Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Carflexi | carflexi.com
thread.title: Gerald

author: Gerald
title: Gerald
text: Booked our Bangkok airport car rental online through carflexi and it was very efficient. Our provider(National Car Rental) had a desk at the airport and the booking was handled quickly and very efficiently. Very friendly staff. The car provided was very good quality and met all of our needs. Great value for money. Would be happy to use both carflexi and National Car Rental again next time.
